parameters.name: metricAttributionArn
parameters.description: The metric attribution's Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: metricAttribution
nested_items.description: The details of the metric attribution.

nested_items.name: metricAttributionArn
nested_items.description: The metric attribution's Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: datasetGroupArn
nested_items.description: The metric attribution's dataset group Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: s3DataDestination
nested_items.description: The configuration details of an Amazon S3 input or output bucket.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The file path of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Key Management Service (KMS) key that Amazon Personalize uses to encrypt or decrypt the input and output files.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM service role that has permissions to add data to your output Amazon S3 bucket and add metrics to Amazon CloudWatch. For more information, see Measuring impact of recommendations.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The metric attribution's creation date time.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The metric attribution's last updated date time.
